cause.description:
95.5% of your gift to The Cedarville Fund through Facebook makes it to campus.
Please be aware that 3% goes to JustGive.org to cover credit card processing fees, and 1.5% goes to Project Agape for the Facebook interface.
Checks made payable to Cedarville University and sent to the below listed address will benefit the mission of CU 100%.
The Cedarville Fund Cedarville University 251 N. Main ST Cedarville, OH 45314
1. Inspire all CU students to achieve excellence in their field of study for the cause of Christ
2. Encourage outsanding CU students through scholarship and financial aid funds
3. Support a liberal arts education marked with the distinctives of Christian ministry, daily chapel, and a Bible minor
cause.mission: We recognize the investment students must make in their own education, but to assure them full access, we ask others to help keep student costs low, thereby increasing the value of tuition dollars.
cause.name: The Cedarville Fund
